faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our white screen tool and its various applications.

questions.question: What is a white screen tool used for?
questions.answer: A white screen tool displays a white color in fullscreen mode, commonly used for monitor testing, photography lighting, reading, and creating a clean background for various purposes.

questions.question: How do I use white screen for monitor testing?
questions.answer: The white screen is perfect for detecting dead pixels, dirt spots, and checking monitor calibration. Simply launch the white screen in fullscreen mode and carefully examine your display.

questions.question: Can I use white screen for photography?
questions.answer: Yes! The white screen is excellent for product photography, creating a clean background, and providing consistent lighting for your photos.

questions.question: Why use white screen for reading?
questions.answer: White light provides good contrast for reading text, making it easier on your eyes when reading books or documents in low light conditions.

questions.question: Is white screen good for focus?
questions.answer: Yes, a white screen can help you focus by eliminating distractions. It's commonly used by students and professionals who want to maintain concentration while working.
